transitdroid.data

Class TableDataGateway

  • java.lang.Object
    • transitdroid.data.TableDataGateway
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CardTDG, DailyPassTDG, MonthlyPassTDG, NightlyPassTDG, PhoneTDG, SinglePassTDG, ThreeDayPassTDG, UserRolesTDG, UserTDG, YearlyPassTDG

    public abstract class TableDataGateway
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    TransitDroid Team Classes that extend this can connect to the database using credentials setup in the resources.properties file.
